trans-unit.source: Specifies the type of character that was received on the serial port of the <see cref="T:System.IO.Ports.SerialPort" /> object.
trans-unit.target: Especifica o tipo de caractere que foi recebido na porta serial do objeto <see cref="T:System.IO.Ports.SerialPort" />.

trans-unit.source: This enumeration is used with the <xref:System.IO.Ports.SerialPort.DataReceived> event.
trans-unit.target: Essa enumeração é usada com a <xref:System.IO.Ports.SerialPort.DataReceived> eventos.

trans-unit.source: You examine the type of character that was received by retrieving the value of the eceivedEventArgs.EventType property of the eceivedEventArgs class.
trans-unit.target: Você examina o tipo de caractere que foi recebido por recuperar o valor da propriedade eceivedEventArgs.EventType da classe eceivedEventArgs.

trans-unit.source: The eceivedEventArgs.EventType property contains one of the values from the <xref:System.IO.Ports.SerialDataReceivedEventArgs.EventType%2A> enumeration.
trans-unit.target: A propriedade eceivedEventArgs.EventType contém um dos valores a partir de <xref:System.IO.Ports.SerialDataReceivedEventArgs.EventType%2A> enumeração.

trans-unit.source: A character was received and placed in the input buffer.
trans-unit.target: Um caractere foi recebido e colocado no buffer de entrada.

trans-unit.source: The end of file character was received and placed in the input buffer.
trans-unit.target: O caractere de fim do arquivo foi recebido e colocado no buffer de entrada.
